summary: The meeting addressed how to respond to questions about ai-diy, with PM Sarah providing guidelines for keeping responses factual, concise, and focused on key platform features while offering to initiate meetings.

decisions.title: Establish response guidelines for ai-diy inquiries
decisions.details: Responses should highlight ai-diy as Ralph Sacco's platform powering Agile in a Box, emphasize AI team collaboration via chat-based meetings and sprints, refer to structured modes and integrations, and offer to start a meeting.
